title: Ticket #2765: Condor_rm doesn't work right on DAG in recovery mode
description: If you condor_rm a condor_dagman that's in recovery mode, the DAGMan job is removed from the queue, but the process isn't actually killed until it has finished with recovery. I think that what happens is that DAGMan never goes back into daemoncore during the recovery process, and that's why it doesn't respond to the signal to quit.
